revised_title: Unusual Blackness of the Face and Extra-Uterine Foetus Cases
semantic_tags: Medicine and Health Sciences > Obstetrics and Gynecology
tldr: The author describes two medical cases: one involving a girl with a sudden, temporary blackness of her face, and the other a rare case of an extra-uterine fetus. The author seeks further information and opinions on the causes of these phenomena and shares knowledge of similar cases from the past.
scientific_discipline: Medicine and Health Sciences > Obstetrics and Gynecology
